body.p: Old Cole lives at Water-Beach near the road from Cambridge to Ely: but I believe, you had best send the book to me, & I will take care it shall be deliver'd to him. I have not seen it yet, but propose to buy it on your recommendation. if it has a hundrdth part of Linnæus's merit, it must be divine! what the title means, I do not conceive.
